channel.title: CVE Feed for Mitsubishi Electric -- Mitsubishi Electric FR Configurator2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mitsubishi Electric -- Mitsubishi Electric FR Configurator2

item.title: CVE-2019-10976|2024-08-04T22:40:15.615Z -- mitsubishi%20electric -- mitsubishi%20electric%20fr%20configurator2
item.description: Mitsubishi Electric FR Configurator2, Version 1.16S and prior. This vulnerability is triggered when input passed to the XML parser is not sanitized while parsing the XML project and/or template file (.frc2). Once a user opens the file, the attacker could read arbitrary files.

item.title: CVE-2019-10972|2024-08-04T22:40:15.483Z -- mitsubishi%20electric -- mitsubishi%20electric%20fr%20configurator2
item.description: Mitsubishi Electric FR Configurator2, Version 1.16S and prior. This vulnerability can be triggered when an attacker provides the target with a rogue project file (.frc2). Once a user opens the rogue project, CPU exhaustion occurs, which causes the software to quit responding until the application is restarted.
